_sText:
A set of stairs which pops out of the ground step by step in a real smooth action and it does this when the player walks through an activator. this is my second prefab so be nice :)! this vmf also works with hl2.btw sorry for the bad picture i will get a better one asap meanwhile watch the video. :) if you use this in your map credit me :)
